## ENVIRONMENTAL CONTROL (Rule 1070)

**Noise Exposure Limits:**
| dBA | Duration |
|-----|----------|
| 90 | 8 hours |
| 95 | 4 hours |
| 100 | 2 hours |
| 105 | 1 hour |
| 110 | 30 minutes |
| 115 | 15 minutes |
- Impact noise max: 140 dB peak

**Illumination:**
- Corridors: 20 lux
- Regular office: 200 lux
- Accounting: 300 lux
- Drafting/Fine assembly: 500-1000 lux

**Temperature:**
- Sedentary work: 23-26C
- Light work: 21-24C
- Heavy work: 17-21C

**Ventilation:**
- Air flow: 0.25-2.5 m/s
- Fresh air: 0.5-1.0 m3/min per person
